title: "No more grievous wounds? MF got nerfed!"
body:
Not true at all. 

"Impure Shots (W) Cooldown now 12 seconds at all ranks down from 16
Impure Shots (W) AS buff increased to 50/55/60/65/70% up from 20/30//40/45/50

Make It Rain (E) Slow changed to 40/45/50/55/60% from 25/35/45/55/65%"

They buffed all of her spells except her ultimate. Like, rank 1 of both her W and E are amazing now - 50% attack speed boost at rank 1 and 40% slow at rank 1, that's really really good. I've been playing her all morning and afternoon on PBE and the changes are most definitely noticeable - along with her improved mobility with her passive. Again, BT rush is amazing on her - the shield legit keeps your passive up 80% of the time and it only drops your passive if the shield is broken/if you actually take damage. With a shield support, this can really help out MF in catching up or escaping - especially because of the new W mechanic that instantly activates Strut.

Does her losing the GW suck? Yeah, it's a bummer that its gone but for that they also added more stuff on to her that helps her out in the places where she needed more help in, like staying alive. She's already one of the best duelists with her auto reset and stacking damage, losing GW won't change that. Ugh, I'm so excited.

replies.body:
The Boards went crazy because Miss Fortune lost her Grevious Wounds, yet people still want it back over the enormous buffs they give her. It's pretty sad and it displays the community has no idea what they're talking about when it comes to Miss Fortune.

_**Buffs**_
1. Strut scales harder into late game + DoTs don't kill the passive + shields can block it breaking off
2.  Double Up does more damage if used correctly
3. Make it Rain has a stronger slow and more damage, but is a tiny bit less strong late game
4. Bullet Time does more damage according to your stacks of W's passive on them
5. Impure Shot has significantly more attack speed + lower cooldown at all ranks + reactivates Strut

_**Nerfs**_
1. Impure Shots no longer has Grevious Wounds when activated
2. Make it Rain duration decreased by 1 second
Not knowing the numbers for the changes didn't really help calm people down, the information was extremely vague.

Not really, they released information on the numbers probably less than 12 hours before the original buffs were released. People just are sheep, one person on the Board, who most likely has never even touched Miss Fortune, cries that the Grevious Wounds removal was a colossal nerf to her, and everyone else does.

Sorry, but the Boards often follow the phrase "Monkey-see-monkey-do.". It happens a lot.

>Bullet Time does more damage according to your stacks of W's passive on them

It already does that. This appears to just be a tooltip clarification.

Make it rain used to activate instantly, then they added a .05 delay to when it actually starts. If they take off the delay all they did was revert it originally. Regardless the ability sucks and I almost never cast it. Also impure shots gets 10%. Op is wrong, and it caps at 60% instead of 50% currently. Also bullet time doesn't just do more damage based on impure shots. It procs them. For example: It I have 4 stacks of impure shots and channel bullet time each bullet will proc the impure shots doing whatever damage it would if I basic attached you. So even though Miss Fortunes ult scales with AP (but the bullets from the ult deal physical damage) it basically scales with AD and does magic damage. Because impure shots is magic damage. Come late game the main damage will be from impure shots. 

Essentially they made the passive better which is cool. And a neat little mechanic on Q. Other than that they killed her dueling potential and those small buffs didn't save it. I love this champion. I mained her and she was the only champion I played for the longest time. And even after owning all the champs in the game I still play her a lot because she's fun. And I did well. 

I'm not a designer ( but I do know what I'm talking about as proved above) and I haven't played her on PBE. But I am not at all looking forward to the grevious wounds removal at all. I was stoked about those changes until I saw that. It made her the perfect champ against healing and whenever playing against her all I did was bring barrier instead of heal and it worked fine. She gets 6 seconds of it and it's cooldown meant that unless she was outrunning you she wouldn't have it up again. Judging by the numbers I'm seeing, I hope these changes don't happen. In my eyes it's a nerf so they can yet again remove grevious wounds.

EDIT** I typed this on a phone. Apologies for typos. 

EDIT 2**

For clarification because so many people don even understand how Miss Fortune works ( and why should you care? She's not a super amazing pick) as I explained the ult above I forgot to mention that bullet time (her ult) also adds stacks of impure shots. So after proc'ing the stack it adds one. So basically each bullet from her ult is a basic attack. Also impure shots gets pretty insane late game. The reason I believe she should keep her grevious wounds is among it being effective against healers it's effective against tanks. Black cleaver on her can shred tanks. You do a good chuck of bonus magic damage and your ult can quickly shred armor while setting up your basic attacks for lots of magic damage if you max out those stacks. 

The primary traits of marksmen are positioning and target selection. This applies to Miss Fortune so very much as she has always been immobile. After channeling an awesome ultimate you're gonna do a lot of damage so you gotta quickly start picking that target you wanna destroy. Those stacks don't last that long. Miss Fortune among being fun can be very strong if played right. But that grevious is wounds helped  with not only fighting other Marksman but also killing tanks which she does extremely well. She's no Vayne with bullshit %Max health bullshit true damage with a tumble every few seconds but if you position correctly and kite well enough you can kill a tank even though you're immobile. 

I could go on and on about this champion because I love it so much. Her drawbacks he strengths and so on. I just felt like editing this post to be honest and the "clarification" Was just an excus to talk about one of my favorite champs who I'm glad to see finally has a discussion going on since she's been left in the dark for so long. In excited about the discussions even though I think the grevious wounds change is a major nerf.

If you claim to be a Miss Fortune main, then I really don't understand how you can say that these changes are an overall nerf to Miss Fortune... 

They buffed her mobility, utility, and steroid with the only trade off being the grievous wounds removal, which is already something that Riot wants to get rid of in champion kits... 

I too love this champion, and I'm telling you that she will be better than she was before...

She can handle tanks as it is, but dueling other Marksmen is no longer practical unless you wanna have a crit-off. I enjoy currently being able to kill everything if I play properly. Now she can run away better. Woo hoo. (The excited about running away thing is sarcasm)

And I'm no main. I'm not by any means a great player of this champ. But I enjoy playing her and play her a lot. You say she got a bunch of new things but that simply isn't true. Her passive never mattered to me. The cleanup is nice but I was fine being smart and playing smart to stay alive instead of relying on some movement speed. Same goes for chasing. The double up change is very cool. But at the end of the day it only really helps you in lane. Maybe once or twice it will help you get the awesome double up double kill (best way I've ever killed enemies in this game) but again it's no grevious wounds. Nothing she gets really compensates for the loss of grevious wounds. Miss Fortune's grevious wounds have never come under fire because it's the one thing she could bring that other marksman can't. I can understand Fizz and Tristana losing theirs because grevious wounds with a Damage over time is kinda stupid. But now Miss Fortune Varus and Katarina have grevious wounds and they don't have dots. You don't wanna have healing halved? Wait for Miss Fortunes steroid to run down, and don't stand near kat or on Varus E. No reason for it to go away. 

Miss Fortune with these changes gets a few tiny clean ups to her kit (the passive change was a long time coming. ) all while losing the thing that stopped the enemy marksman from trying to fight you while you ulted. Countless times I've killed a full health marksman who flanked me while channeling ult. And the counter play is simple. Similar to Tristana just wait for the steroid to go down and you'll kill her. Every time. Lucian and Graves will burst her down Ezrealand Tristana as well. Kalista and Vayne will run you down and Draven (who kills you regardless) will 2 shot you. After these changes she gets a 70% steroid just like Graves and a similar steroid to others and it becomes the battle of RNG. And Since double up (to me) seems like it's been slowed down every other marksman has abilities to weave in except you. So you either lose to abilities or win because crits. 

I will get over it if the changes and play her because she's mostly the same. But it's a nerf because now she gets beat by pretty much every marksman outside of lane and gets nothing (again those changes are absolutely nothing compared to being able to duel another Marksman) back.

I wrote this on my lunch break so I hope that this all makes sense.

Well I am a Miss Fortune main, and I assure you that her losing grievous wounds does not mean that she loses to almost every marksman... on the contrary, almost every marksman loses to Miss Fortune in a 1v1 battle, ESPECIALLY when she is ahead and even when she is behind because her passive damage always makes up for any item disadvantage she may have.

This champion has one of the best dueling kits in the game, with an auto attack reset and stacking damage per auto, not even including the grievous wounds. What champion are you thinking of, because it certainly doesn't sound like Miss Fortune to me...? 

Her spells, all around the board, are better than they were before. Her losing grievous wounds and losing one of her MULTIPLE dueling advantages does not mean anything, she is still going to be a dueling queen, just with better mobility/utility/steroids to help her stay alive and kite more efficiently.

Miss Fortune main who didn't even know he actual % of her W? That's the reason I didn't reply to you because it seemed you didn't even know what you were talking about. 

You completely ignored the part where I told you how other marksman are gonna kill her. But whatever. You disregard everything in my post including the part where I tell you that double up seems to have gotten slower for me. It's not a great aa reset. It used to be but it seems slower. Maybe I'm crazy. Anyways it's gonna be a crits battle now. She lost dueling potential in every way and that impure shots is mediocre until it stacks to become devistating. No duel is gonna last that long. Read the part where I tell you who will kill her now and you'll see why. She might win a crit off basic attack battle but Jinx can attack from further away to start and then ramp up for so much attack speed. Tristana out ranges her graves and Lucian can burst her down as well. Marksman aren't made to duel but considering the only advantage Miss Fortune truely had over anyone was team fight wombo combos (which I honestly think a few jinx rocket crits would do more damage) then this all sucks. Again you ignore the part where I point out that these are small buffs in exchange for something that can't be priced. Grevious wounds. You can't put a price on that. The small buffs are just that; small. 

I'm not gonna bother replying to you again because you don't even read (or at least take) my post into consideration when replying. Every time I've shown my knowledge of this champion. I know what she used to be like and the day they reworked her ult to do physical damage and apply impure shots was one of my favorite patches. And now they've just made her as generic as can be with nothing else to set her aside from other marksmen. 

I'll play her and I'll have fun but I'll always remember the former champ that could shred tanks and duel the enemy marksman and the amount of fun it was.

1 - I did not ignore you, I directly disagreed with you saying that she loses to other marksmen. Grievous wounds were a small part of her kit, she can and will hold her own in duels against most marksmen. 
2 - No, her Q is not slower. 
3 - There is no such thing as something being "not a great AA reset", an AA reset is always beneficial - that doesn't even make any sense. 
4 - With enough AD, her AA+Q+AA reset combo automatically will apply an extra BF sword worth of magic damage to her auto attacks that will only build up further. AA+Q+AA is almost instant. You claiming that her stacking damage is irrelevant and takes time to become "devastating" is false. 
5 - Teamfight wombos are not the only advantage MF has over others, this is (like most of your idiotic statements) also false...
6 - These buffs are not small. I have played her on the PBE for two+ days, these buffs are amazing and help her where she needs it most, and the buffs are most definitely noticeable. Her losing GW, which again is a mechanic that Riot is already trying to get rid of anyways, does not cancel all of her new strengths out, you're delusional.  

So again, on the contrary, it's you that has no clue what they're talking about. Please take several seats.

I have a question, what's the scaling on her passive as she levels up? is it speed or delay reduction for activation?

I know BT is now a priority on her if you plan to maintain your passive up because of the shield mechanic. I'm just worried that it's mandatory to have a shield support now until she hits that mark (further narrowing down her effectiveness), and her preferred supports are lockdown ones like Leona, Alistar or now Nautilus.

I've always considered her a strong dueler but with equal items she loses to like half the adcs in the meta (item gap SHOULD happen since she's supposed to win lane phase). But it's bothersome that the kit tweaks didn't involve her getting more physical based damage than before. Her impure shots apply a whooping total of 48% of your bonus AD per AA with all 8 stacks......as magic damage, and in late game, even with high amounts of AD, armor penetration doesn't help that aditional damage boost. It's like they're suggesting you HAVE to either run hybrid pen runes or magic pen boots like Corki. Also, the impure shots mechanic means that she needs a good base of AS and a good amount of AD for her to be viable late game

If you compare her to other adcs, Draven gets a 85% of total ad boost for each axe, if he has two axes at hand, that's 170% of his AD if he gets off 2 AAs on you, and the extra AD counts in critical strike and lifesteal calculations. Same goes for Vayne and Tumble. TO achieve a similar damage boost as Vayne, she needs to get off 8 autoattacks while vayne needs to Tumble once. Vayne could at least get two tumbles before MF can apply her 8th stack of impure shots.

She's definitely in a weird spot right now, I don't think any other adc has that many downsides for such high rewards, because her damage potential is INSANE in "perfect" scenarios

It is a nerf though, in reality.

Although her impure shots is definitely a lot better, I feel like the grievous wounds made her unique compared to the other adc's currently out there. She's much more, generic now.

The grievous wounds as well helped her duel significantly.

This^. The problem is, Riot wishes to get rid of grievous wounds so that they can better balance spell vamp/life steal. However, the GW was a major unique skill/ability for MF. It was one of the only reasons to pick her vs other adcs. And remember, Riot doesn't want all mages to be the same. Or all adcs to be the same. So people got upset about her losing her GW "identity".

She is outclassed by every adc still and even more due to the removal of grievous wounds, the only thing that made her and Varus unique in fighting the tank META, sustain lanes and ADC's that rush BT like Draven. Why would I want to pick Miss Fortune now when I can play hyper carry {{champion:222}},{{champion:67}} . Grevious wounds applying, poke and cc {{champion:110}} . AOE Damage that scales of AD {{champion:104}}  . Highly mobile teamfighting {{champion:15}}. I mean come on her buffs aren't actually going to change anything about her viability, and maybe in fact make her less viable now. 

I know Riot wants to remove grievious wounds but they should have made MF a unique adc with something that sets her apart from the rest. Every adc has a niche strength except her.

If you want a duelist, you're going to take {{champion:67}} and if you want tower killing you'll take {{champion:18}} .  Even {{champion:6}} has an actual role for when your team is stacking tanky against assassins and you want to be able to swap/delete the main carry on the other team.

It seems like {{champion:21}} is for a team that wants a carry that will eat all the skillshots in a team fight.  {{item:3083}} ADTank.
